Package suncertify.client.view

Interface Summary
View This is the interface exposed to the controller and its actions that is implemented by MainWindow and contains all methods that need to be implemented by the Gui View.
 

Class Summary
BookPanel Panel where you can type a customer no and booking the currently selected record, or unbook it
FilterPanel Panel for filtering out the records which need to be shown in the table
MainWindow The main application window containing a menu, a toolbar, a TablePanel on the right with a JTable in a JScrollView, a FilterPanel on left top to filter data, a BookPanel on left bottom to book / unbook customers, two splitters to separate the panels and a StatusPanel at the bottom.
StatusPanel Panel showing the current status, at the bottom
TablePanel The panel containing the table, inside a scrollpane, listing all the rooms which can be booked
